mapper.sql: id, user_name, user_pwd, nickname, full_name, phone, email, address, sex, birthday, id_card, avatar_url, status, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time
mapper.select:
select
from sys_user
and status = 1
and user_name like concat('%',#{param.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and nickname like concat('%',#{param.nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and email like concat('%',#{param.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and phone like concat('%',#{param.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and full_name like concat('%',#{param.fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select su.id,su.user_name,su.user_pwd,su.nickname, su.full_name,su.phone,su.email,su.address, su.sex,su.birthday,su.id_card,su.avatar_url, su.status,su.created_by,su.created_time, su.updated_by,su.updated_time from sys_user su left join ( select user_id,group_concat(role_id) roleIds from user_role group by user_id ) ur on su.id = ur.user_id
and instr(concat(',',ur.roleIds,','),concat(',',#{param.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},','))
left join ( select ur.user_id,group_concat(permission_id) permissionIds from user_role ur inner join role_permission rp on ur.role_id = rp.role_id group by ur.user_id ) rp on su.id = rp.user_id
and instr(concat(',',rp.permissionIds,','),concat(',',#{param.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},','))
and su.status=1
and ( su.user_name like concat('%',#{param.searchVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or su.nickname like concat('%',#{param.searchVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') )
order by
ur.roleIds desc,
rp.permissionIds desc,
su.created_time

SELECT sp.id, parent_id, permission_name, permission_type, permission_desc, resource_url, icon, order_num, sp.status FROM user_role ur inner join sys_role sr on ur.role_id = sr.id inner join role_permission rp on sr.id = rp.role_id inner join sys_permission sp on rp.permission_id = sp.id and sp.status = 1 where ur.user_id = #{userId}
